author: sky.cactus
content: One caveat from my comments on "we need this for stateless anyway", I realized after saying that that the plan is to switch to verkle tries before stateless, so we probably shouldn't spend too much time of the merklization technique for this since we'll be swapping it, but I think we can at least agree on the structure/enveloping and maybe versioning (to make the switch from merkle to verkle painless).

author: sky.cactus
content: Another consideration: For testing/debugging purposes, we don't need validated witnesses.  Just a simple mapping of tree location => data is sufficient (which will reduce the size of the witness potentially significantly).

content: KV-witness separated data from the commitment, so you can potentially replace it
